Source code for blend.galaxy.libraries

"""
Contains possible interactions with the Galaxy Data Libraries
"""
import requests


[docs]class LibraryClient(object):
    def __init__(self, galaxy_instance):
        self.gi = galaxy_instance
        self.module = 'libraries'
        self.url = '/'.join([self.gi.url, self.module])
    

[docs]    def get_libraries(self, name=None, library_id=None, deleted=False):
        """
        Get all the libraries or filter a specific one via the provided name or ID.
        Provide only one argument: name or library_id.
        If want to get library's contents, set contents to True (note that
        contents can be set to True only if name or library_id is provided)
        Return a JSON formatted dict response.
        """
        url = self.gi._make_url(self, deleted=deleted)
        llr = requests.get(url, verify=False, params=self.gi.key_dict)
        # If provided, filter the retrieved list based on name or ID
        if name is not None or library_id is not None:
            for lib in llr.json:
                if name == lib['name'] or library_id == lib['id']:
                    return lib
        # print llr.json, llr.url
        return llr
